title: The default value set in the list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: When the default value is modified in the list box of a report parameter, the previously set default value is lost.
OB: After modifying the default value in the list box of a report parameter, the previously set default value is lost.
SR:
1. Open the report parameter settings. 
2. Set a default value in the list box. 
3. Modify the default value. 
4. Observe that the previously set default value is lost.
